name: Thank The Maker
Lore: 'Reference to ''One Who Creates,'' used by droids in an almostreligious way. C-3PO used phrase upon getting a much-needed cleansing oil bath.',
Text: 'Use 1 Force during opponent''s control phase if you have a droid on the table and were drained of at least 5 Force. Draw destiny. That number of cards are randomly selected and retrieved from your Lost Pile.',
